languages.text: Кибелла, Второй ткач Кровавой паутины, преданно служила Висирю и Домин, но с годами тревожащие изменения все сильнее преображали ее. Увязнув в тенетах сомнений, Кибелла перестала касаться Таро Императора, ибо расклады его были устрашающими, противоречивыми и энигматичными. Неумирающий даровал ей иные знамения, являющиеся во снах, и Кибелла убивала все чаще и чаще, отправляя души к Императору десятками и сотнями. Она перестала говорить, приняв обет молчания, и доспехи ее покрыла корка ржавчины и запекшейся крови. В экипаже шептались, что она безумна, но никто не смел оказать сопротивление священной телохранительнице само{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана.

Second Spinner Kibellah of the Bloodspun Web served the Vizsier and the Domin loyally — but over the years, alarming changes transformed her further and further. Caught in a tangle of doubts, Kibellah began to neglect the Emperor's Tarot, for its readings were terrifying, contradictory, and enigmatic. The Undying One gave her a different kind of signs through her dreams, and Kibellah killed ever more often, sending souls to the Emperor in their dozens and hundreds. She took a vow of silence and never spoke again. Her armour crusted over with rust and gore. There were whispers of her insanity among the crew, but no one would dare stand up to the sacred bodyguard of the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}.

languages.text: Die Zweite Spinnerin Kibellah vom Blutgesponnenen Netz diente dem Vizsier und Domin loyal ... aber im Laufe der Jahre durchlebte sie alarmierende Veränderungen. Gefangen in einem Netz von Zweifeln vernachlässigte sie das Tarot des Imperators, weil seine Offenbarungen erschreckend, widersprüchlich und geheimnisvoll waren. Der Todlose schickte ihr in ihren Träumen andersgeartete Zeichen und Kibellah tötete häufiger denn je, um dem Imperator Dutzende, wenn nicht Hunderte Seelen zu schicken. Sie legte ein Schweigegelübde ab und sprach nie wieder auch nur ein Wort. Ihre Rüstung war mit Rost und Eingeweiden überzogen. Unter der Crew kursierten Gerüchte über ihren vermeintlichen Wahnsinn, aber niemand wagte es, der heiligen Leibwächterin des Lord Captains die Stirn zu bieten.

languages.text: La deuxième tisseuse de la Toile de Sang continua à servir fidèlement le vizir et {mf|le|la} Domin, mais au fil des années, des changements alarmants la transformèrent profondément. Empêtrée dans ses doutes, Kibellah commença à négliger le tarot de l'Empereur, tant ses prédictions étaient terrifiantes, contradictoires et énigmatiques. Dans ses songes, elle reçut des signes différents de l'Immortel et elle se mit à tuer encore plus souvent, envoyant des âmes auprès de l'Empereur par centaines. Elle fit vœu de silence et ne prononça plus jamais le moindre mot. Son armure se recouvrit progressivement d'une épaisse couche de sang et de rouille. Le bruit courait parmi l'équipage qu'elle était devenue folle à lier, mais personne n'aurait osé tenir tête à la garde du corps sacrée {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} en personne.
languages.original_text: Second Spinner Kibellah of the Bloodspun Web served the Vizsier and the Domin loyally — but over the years, alarming changes transformed her further and further. languages.text: La segunda tejedora Kibellah de la Red Sanguinolenta sirvió fielmente a su Visir y su Domin, pero con los años una serie de cambios alarmantes la transformaron cada vez más. Atrapada por una maraña de dudas, Kibellah empezó a ignorar el Tarot del Emperador, pues los resultados de las lecturas eran aterradores, contradictorios e incomprensibles. El Inmortal empezó a enviarle otra clase de señales en sueños, y Kibellah mató más que nunca. Enviaba almas al Emperador por docenas y por centenares. Prestó voto de silencio y nunca más pronunció una palabra. Su armadura quedó cubierta de óxido y vísceras. Entre la tripulación corrían susurros sobre su creciente locura, pero nadie osó nunca oponerse a la guardaespaldas sagrada de{mf|l| la} propi{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán.

languages.text: ブラッドスパン・ウェブの第二の紡ぎ手であるキベラは、ヴィジールとドミンに忠実に仕えていた。しかし年月を経るうちに、驚くべき変化が彼女をさらに変貌させていった。疑念のもつれに囚われたキベラは、皇帝陛下の占い札を無視しはじめた。読み取ったものは恐ろしく、矛盾に満ちていて、不可解だったがために。不死の者が夢を通して彼女に異なる種類の印を与えたことにより、キベラはそれまで以上に頻繁に殺人を犯し、何十、何百もの魂を皇帝のもとに送った。彼女は沈黙の誓いを立てて、二度と口を開くことはなかった。彼女の鎧は錆と血で汚れていた。クルーの間では彼女が狂っているのではと囁かれていたが、ロード・キャプテンの神聖なボディーガードに立ち向かう勇気を持つものは一人としていなかった。

Caught in a tangle of doubts, Kibellah began to neglect the Emperor's Tarot, for its readings were terrifying, contradictory, and enigmatic. The Undying One gave her a different kind of signs through her dreams, and Kibellah killed ever more often, sending souls to the Emperor in their dozens and hundreds. She took a vow of silence and never spoke again. Her armour crusted over with rust and gore. languages.text: 织血罗网的次席织网者绮贝菈忠诚地侍奉着宿老与秘者，但随着时间推移，她的身上出现了越来越多令人担忧的变化。由于心中充满了困惑，绮贝菈不再使用帝皇的塔罗牌进行占卜，因为塔罗牌的预兆充满了恐怖、矛盾、谜团。不死之神通过梦境，给了她截然不同的指示，而绮贝菈也开始越来越频繁地杀人，将成百上千的灵魂送到了神皇手中。她许下了沉默誓言，决心不再说话，她的盔甲上沾满了锈渍与血迹。所有船员都在窃窃私语，说她发疯了，但没人敢反抗行商浪人本人的神圣护卫。
languages.original_text: Second Spinner Kibellah of the Bloodspun Web served the Vizsier and the Domin loyally — but over the years, alarming changes transformed her further and further. Caught in a tangle of doubts, Kibellah began to neglect the Emperor's Tarot, for its readings were terrifying, contradictory, and enigmatic. The Undying One gave her a different kind of signs through her dreams, and Kibellah killed ever more often, sending souls to the Emperor in their dozens and hundreds. She took a vow of silence and never spoke again. Her armour crusted over with rust and gore. There were whispers of her insanity among the crew, but no one would dare stand up to the sacred bodyguard of the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}.

languages.text: Kanipi Ağı'nın İkinci Dokuru Kibellah, Vezir'e ve Domin'e sadakatle hizmet etti. Fakat yıllar geçtikçe gittikçe daha da endişe verici değişiklikler vuku buldu. Kuşku ağına düşen Kibellah, İmparator'un Tarotu'nu ihmal etmeye başladı. Zira okumaları ürkütücü, çelişkili ve esrarengizdi. Ölmeyen, düşlerinde ona farklı türden işaretler gönderdi. Kibellah da daha sık öldürmeye başlayarak onlarca, hatta yüzlerce ruhu İmparator'un huzuruna gönderdi. Sükûnet yemini ederek bir daha tek kelime dahi etmedi. Zırhı, pas ve kanla kaplandı. Mürettebat arasında aklını yitirdiğine dair fısıltılar dolaşsa da kimse, Lord Kaptan'ın kutsal korumasının karşısına dikilmeye cüret edemedi.
languages.original_text: Second Spinner Kibellah of the Bloodspun Web served the Vizsier and the Domin loyally — but over the years, alarming changes transformed her further and further. Caught in a tangle of doubts, Kibellah began to neglect the Emperor's Tarot, for its readings were terrifying, contradictory, and enigmatic. The Undying One gave her a different kind of signs through her dreams, and Kibellah killed ever more often, sending souls to the Emperor in their dozens and hundreds. She took a vow of silence and never spoke again. Her armour crusted over with rust and gore. There were whispers of her insanity among the crew, but no one would dare stand up to the sacred bodyguard of the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}.
